SEARCH
Module com.codemavriks.aptech
Package com.codemavriks.aptech.components

Interface SidePanel.SidePanelListener

Enclosing class:
SidePanel
public static interface SidePanel.SidePanelListener
Interface for side panel event callbacks. This interface defines the contract for components that want to receive notifications about side panel events. It uses default methods to make implementation optional for listeners that don't need all events. Design Pattern: Observer Pattern - Defines the observer interface for side panel events - Uses default methods for flexible implementation - Enables loose coupling between components
